oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Effect of substituents and media on the photochromic properties of azobenzene systems
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: SINGH, AK
MADHUSOODNAN, KS
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: hydroxide ion
isomerization
photochromism
azobenzene
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: E-azobenzene bearing electron-withdrawing and ionizable substituents (e.g. 2) exhibits solvatochromic behaviour, high % of Z isomer at photostationary state, and very fast thermal Z --> E isomerization in protic polar solvents. A rotational mechanism has been suggested for the isomerization process.
